title: Lane Taken by (User Name)
body: I was thinking about a good idea that would help a lot of us out, when your in champion select doing a PvP or vs bots, and you call your lane. Eg( I choose Vel'Koz mid first and then some one else calls it second and then there is a argue ment over it, I was thinking why not add a thing that detects that you have called mid first and then there's a slot down the Botton of the game that has top, mid, bot, jg and who ever calls the lane first gets there name in the slot of what they wanted, and if I choose mid and then go oh no I wanna actually go top, you can swap some one for it. This is just a suggestion and I hope you agree.
